Can only be called by the current owner."},"unlock(uint256)":{"params":{"value":"The amount of gold to unlock."}},"withdraw(uint256)":{"params":{"index":"The index of the pending withdrawal to withdraw."}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addSlasher(string)":{"notice":"Adds `slasher` to whitelist of approved slashing addresses."},"decrementNonvotingAccountBalance(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Decrements the non-voting balance for an account."},"getAccountNonvotingLockedGold(address)":{"notice":"Returns the total amount of non-voting locked gold for an account."},"getAccountTotalLockedGold(address)":{"notice":"Returns the total amount of locked gold for an account."},"getNonvotingLockedGold()":{"notice":"Returns the total amount of locked gold not being used to vote in elections."},"getPendingWithdrawals(address)":{"notice":"Returns the pending withdrawals from unlocked gold for an account."},"getTotalLockedGold()":{"notice":"Returns the total amount of locked gold in the system. Note that this does not include  gold that has been unlocked but not yet withdrawn."},"getTotalPendingWithdrawals(address)":{"notice":"Returns the total amount to withdraw from unlocked gold for an account."},"getVersionNumber()":{"notice":"Returns the storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract."},"incrementNonvotingAccountBalance(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Increments the non-voting balance for an account."},"initialize(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy."},"lock()":{"notice":"Locks gold to be used for voting."},"relock(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Relocks gold that has been unlocked but not withdrawn."},"removeSlasher(string,uint256)":{"notice":"Removes `slasher` from whitelist of approved slashing addresses."},"setRegistry(address)":{"notice":"Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract."},"setUnlockingPeriod(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the duration in seconds users must wait before withdrawing gold after unlocking."},"slash(address,uint256,address,uint256,address[],address[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Slashes `account` by reducing its nonvoting locked gold by `penalty`.        If there is not enough nonvoting locked gold to slash, calls into        `Election.slashVotes` to slash the remaining gold. If `account` does not have        `penalty` worth of locked gold, slashes `account`'s total locked gold.        Also sends `reward` gold to the reporter, and penalty-reward to the Community Fund."},"unlock(uint256)":{"notice":"Unlocks gold that becomes withdrawable after the unlocking period."},"withdraw(uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraws gold that has been unlocked after the unlocking period has decrementNonvotingAccountBalance(address.details: Can only be called by the registered "Election" smart contract.

params.account: The account whose non-voting balance should be decremented.
params.value: The amount by which to decrement.

getAccountNonvotingLockedGold(address).return: The total amount of non-voting locked gold for an account.

getAccountTotalLockedGold(address).return: The total amount of locked gold for an account.

getNonvotingLockedGold().return: The total amount of locked gold not being used to vote in elections.

getPendingWithdrawals(address).return: The value and timestamp for each pending withdrawal.

getTotalLockedGold().return: The total amount of locked gold in the system.

getVersionNumber().return: The storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

incrementNonvotingAccountBalance(address.details: Can only be called by the registered Election smart contract.

params.account: The account whose non-voting balance should be incremented.
params.value: The amount by which to increment.

params.registryAddress: The address of the registry core smart contract.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.index: The index of the pending withdrawal to relock from.
params.value: The value to relock from the specified pending withdrawal.

params.index: Index of the provided identifier in slashingWhiteList array.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

slash(address,uint256,address,uint256,ad.details: Fails if `reward` is greater than `account`'s total locked gold.

params.greaters: The groups receiving more votes than the i'th group, or 0 if the i'th group                has the most votes of any validator group.
params.indices: The indices of the i'th group in `account`'s voting list.
params.lessers: The groups receiving fewer votes than i'th group, or 0 if the i'th group has               the fewest votes of any validator group.
params.reporter: Address of account reporting the slasher.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.value: The amount of gold to unlock.

params.index: The index of the pending withdrawal to withdraw.

addSlasher(string).notice: Adds `slasher` to whitelist of approved slashing addresses.

decrementNonvotingAccountBalance(address.notice: Decrements the non-voting balance for an account.

getAccountNonvotingLockedGold(address).notice: Returns the total amount of non-voting locked gold for an account.

getAccountTotalLockedGold(address).notice: Returns the total amount of locked gold for an account.

getNonvotingLockedGold().notice: Returns the total amount of locked gold not being used to vote in elections.

getPendingWithdrawals(address).notice: Returns the pending withdrawals from unlocked gold for an account.

getTotalLockedGold().notice: Returns the total amount of locked gold in the system. Note that this does not include  gold that has been unlocked but not yet withdrawn.

getTotalPendingWithdrawals(address).notice: Returns the total amount to withdraw from unlocked gold for an account.

getVersionNumber().notice: Returns the storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

incrementNonvotingAccountBalance(address.notice: Increments the non-voting balance for an account.

initialize(address,uint256).notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

lock().notice: Locks gold to be used for voting.

relock(uint256,uint256).notice: Relocks gold that has been unlocked but not withdrawn.

removeSlasher(string,uint256).notice: Removes `slasher` from whitelist of approved slashing addresses.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setUnlockingPeriod(uint256).notice: Sets the duration in seconds users must wait before withdrawing gold after unlocking.

slash(address,uint256,address,uint256,ad.notice: Slashes `account` by reducing its nonvoting locked gold by `penalty`.        If there is not enough nonvoting locked gold to slash, calls into        `Election.slashVotes` to slash the remaining gold. If `account` does not have        `penalty` worth of locked gold, slashes `account`'s total locked gold.        Also sends `reward` gold to the reporter, and penalty-reward to the Community Fund.

unlock(uint256).notice: Unlocks gold that becomes withdrawable after the unlocking period.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws gold that has been unlocked after the unlocking period has passed.
